parameters.query: SELECT channel_id, youtube_channel_id, access_token, refresh_token, expires_at, token_type FROM youtube_oauth_tokens WHERE channel_id = $1 OR channel_id = (SELECT channel_id FROM content_master WHERE content_id = $2 LIMIT 1) LIMIT 1
UPDATE youtube_oauth_tokens SET access_token = $1, expires_at = $2, updated_at = NOW() WHERE channel_id = $3

SELECT cm.content_id, cm.title, cm.script_data, cm.audio_url, cm.thumbnail_url, pm.title_en, pm.description_en, pm.image_url FROM content_master cm LEFT JOIN products_master pm ON cm.product_id = pm.id WHERE cm.content_id = $1 OR pm.id = $2 LIMIT 1
